    void sendFriendRequest​(User actor, User affected)
    method used to send friend request if there is already a request present in the opposite direction, it just gets accepted if there is already a request present in the same direction, nothing is done

    • sendFriendRequest

      public void sendFriendRequest​(User actor, User affected)
      method used to send friend request if there is already a request present in the opposite direction, it just gets accepted if there is already a request present in the same direction, nothing is done
      Parameters:
      actor - the user sending the request
      affected - the user that gets requested
